name: G-Max Cannonade
effect: The Water-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Geyser while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Additionally, deal 1 Damage against all foes at the end of each Round, water-types are immune to this damage. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user charges and shoots some higly-pressured constant streams of water like lasers. The never-ending water lingers as dangerous puddles to step in.
